event.description: Denard Span pops out to shortstop Chris Owings.
Brandon Belt walks.
Hunter Pence singles on a sharp ground ball to center fielder A. J. Pollock. Brandon Belt to 2nd.
Buster Posey called out on strikes.
Brandon Crawford pops out to first baseman Paul Goldschmidt in foul territory.
Eduardo Nunez singles on a soft ground ball to third baseman Jake Lamb.
With Jarrett Parker batting, Eduardo Nunez steals (1) 2nd base.
Jarrett Parker grounds out, first baseman Paul Goldschmidt to pitcher Zack Greinke. Eduardo Nunez to 3rd.
Joe Panik out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder A. Pollock. Eduardo Nunez scores.
Madison Bumgarner walks.
Denard Span grounds out, first baseman Paul Goldschmidt to pitcher Zack Greinke.
Brandon Belt called out on strikes.
Hunter Pence strikes out swinging.
Buster Posey grounds out, shortstop Chris Owings to first baseman Paul Goldschmidt.
Brandon Crawford flies out to center fielder A. J. Pollock.
Eduardo Nunez doubles (1) on a sharp line drive to left fielder Yasmany Tomas.
Jarrett Parker strikes out swinging.
Joe Panik grounds out, catcher Jeff Mathis to first baseman Paul Goldschmidt.
Madison Bumgarner homers (1) on a line drive to left center field.
Denard Span flies out to left fielder Yasmany Tomas.
Brandon Belt flies out to center fielder A. J. Pollock.
Hunter Pence pops out softly to catcher Jeff Mathis in foul territory.
Pitching Change: Tom Wilhelmsen replaces Zack Greinke, batting 9th.
Buster Posey flies out to right fielder David Peralta.
Brandon Crawford doubles (1) on a sharp fly ball to right fielder David Peralta.
Eduardo Nunez singles on a ground ball to center fielder A. J. Pollock. Brandon Crawford scores.
Pitching Change: Jorge De La Rosa replaces Tom Wilhelmsen, batting 9th.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Gorkys Hernandez replaces Jarrett Parker.
With Gorkys Hernandez batting, Eduardo Nunez steals (2) 2nd base.
D-backs challenged (tag play), call on the field was overturned: Eduardo Nunez out at 3rd, catcher Jeff Mathis to third baseman Jake Lamb.
Gorkys Hernandez called out on strikes.
Pitching Change: Andrew Chafin replaces Jorge De La Rosa, batting 9th, replacing Nick Ahmed.
Joe Panik grounds out, shortstop Chris Owings to first baseman Paul Goldschmidt.
Madison Bumgarner homers (2) on a fly ball to left center field.
Denard Span singles on a ground ball to second baseman Brandon Drury.
Giants challenged (tag play), call on the field was upheld: With Brandon Belt batting, Denard Span picked off and caught stealing 2nd base, pitcher Andrew Chafin to first baseman Paul Goldschmidt.
Brandon Belt grounds out, second baseman Brandon Drury to first baseman Paul Goldschmidt.
Pitching Change: J. Hoover replaces Andrew Chafin, batting 9th, replacing Chris Iannetta.
Hunter Pence strikes out swinging.
Buster Posey walks.
Brandon Crawford singles on a sharp ground ball to right fielder David Peralta. Buster Posey to 2nd.
Eduardo Nunez lines out sharply to right fielder David Peralta.
Gorkys Hernandez strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Fernando Rodney replaces J. Hoover, batting 9th.
Joe Panik triples (1) on a fly ball to left fielder Yasmany Tomas.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Conor Gillaspie replaces Hunter Strickland.
Conor Gillaspie out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder A. J. Pollock. Joe Panik scores.
Denard Span singles on a ground ball to second baseman Brandon Drury.
With Brandon Belt batting, wild pitch by Fernando Rodney, Denard Span to 2nd.
Brandon Belt walks.
With Hunter Pence batting, wild pitch by Fernando Rodney, Denard Span to 3rd. Brandon Belt to 2nd.
Hunter Pence walks.
Buster Posey flies out to right fielder David Peralta.
Brandon Crawford grounds into a force out, fielded by catcher Jeff Mathis. Denard Span out at home.
A. J. Pollock pops out to first baseman Brandon Belt.
Chris Owings strikes out swinging, catcher Buster Posey to first baseman Brandon Belt.
Paul Goldschmidt grounds out, second baseman Joe Panik to first baseman Brandon Belt.
Jake Lamb strikes out swinging.
Yasmany Tomas called out on strikes.
Brandon Drury strikes out swinging.
David Peralta grounds out, second baseman Joe Panik to first baseman Brandon Belt.
Jeff Mathis flies out to center fielder Denard Span.
Zack Greinke lines out to right fielder Hunter Pence.
A. J. Pollock flies out to center fielder Denard Span.
Chris Owings strikes out swinging, catcher Buster Posey to first baseman Brandon Belt.
Paul Goldschmidt flies out sharply to left fielder Jarrett Parker.
Jake Lamb strikes out swinging.
Yasmany Tomas strikes out swinging.
Brandon Drury grounds out, third baseman Eduardo Nunez to first baseman Brandon Belt.
Gorkys Hernandez remains in the game as the left fielder.
David Peralta strikes out swinging.
Jeff Mathis triples (1) on a ground ball to left fielder Gorkys Hernandez.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Nick Ahmed replaces Jorge De La Rosa.
Nick Ahmed singles on a line drive to right fielder Hunter Pence. Jeff Mathis scores.
A. J. Pollock homers (1) on a fly ball to center field. Nick Ahmed scores.
Chris Owings strikes out swinging.
Paul Goldschmidt singles on a soft ground ball to pitcher Madison Bumgarner.
Jake Lamb strikes out swinging.
Yasmany Tomas called out on strikes.
Brandon Drury singles on a sharp ground ball to third baseman Eduardo Nunez.
David Peralta flies out sharply to left fielder Gorkys Hernandez.
Jeff Mathis singles on a ground ball to right fielder Hunter Pence. Brandon Drury to 2nd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Chris Iannetta replaces Andrew Chafin.
Chris Iannetta grounds out to first baseman Brandon Belt.
Pitching Change: Derek Law replaces Madison Bumgarner, batting 9th.
A. J. Pollock singles on a line drive to right fielder Hunter Pence.
Chris Owings singles on a ground ball to right fielder Hunter Pence. A. J. Pollock to 2nd.
Paul Goldschmidt singles on a ground ball to left fielder Gorkys Hernandez. A. J. Pollock scores. Chris Owings to 2nd.
Pitching Change: Ty Blach replaces Derek Law, batting 9th.
Jake Lamb grounds into a double play, second baseman Joe Panik to shortstop Brandon Crawford to first baseman Brandon Belt. Chris Owings to 3rd. Paul Goldschmidt out at 2nd.
Pitching Change: Hunter Strickland replaces Ty Blach, batting 9th.
Yasmany Tomas grounds out, pitcher Hunter Strickland to first baseman Brandon Belt.
Pitching Change: Mark Melancon replaces Hunter Strickland, batting 9th, replacing Conor Gillaspie.
Brandon Drury strikes out on a foul tip.
David Peralta grounds out sharply, second baseman Joe Panik to first baseman Brandon Belt.
Jeff Mathis doubles (1) on a sharp line drive to center fielder Denard Span, deflected by left fielder Gorkys Hernandez.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-runner Jeremy Hazelbaker replaces Jeff Mathis.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Daniel Descalso replaces Fernando Rodney.
Daniel Descalso singles on a line drive to center fielder Denard Span. Jeremy Hazelbaker scores.
A. J. Pollock singles on a ground ball to center fielder Denard Span, deflected by second baseman Joe Panik. Daniel Descalso to 3rd.
With Chris Owings batting, A. J. Pollock advances to 2nd on defensive indifference.
Chris Owings singles on a line drive to right fielder Hunter Pence. Daniel Descalso scores. A. J. Pollock to 3rd.
